channel.title: ColdC - MUD
channel.description:
Hello all;
I was wondering if anyone here knew the language of ColdC. It's a language that not many people know, but maybe someone here does?
It's for a MUD client, I could use a little help with some of the coding on. If you don't know what ColdC is, you can find it on Wikipedia.
There's not much help with snippets and such on the web; for I have already looked from some help.... not many people know. I figure a community of coders could help out. :)

item.title: ColdC - MUD
item.dc:creator: @BlankFuture BlankFuture
item.description:
@BlankFuture wrote:

Thank you. I’m building this through Pueblo, for a friend who needs help. Are you familiar with Pueblo by any chance? Or have you heard of it?

Read full topic
